rAya#H suqvIraq ityA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitat krUqrami#vaq vA Eqtat ka#rOtiq yad vaqpA-mu#t^^Kiqda-tyuqrva#ntari#kShaq-manviqhItyA#haq SAntyaiq pra vA EqShO$&smAllOqkAccya#vatEq yaH paqSuM mRuqtyavE# nIqyamA#namanvAqraBa#tE 
vapAqSrapa#NIq puna#raqnvAra#BatEq&sminnEqva lOqkE prati# tiShThatyaqgninA# puqrastA#dEtiq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyAq athO# dEqvatA# Eqva haqvyEnA- [  ] 48
